div.head: 29.3.1885 Sonntag
div.p:
My confirmation. From home I first drove with the pastorin Blümer, Auguste to aunt Lulu’s and took her and uncle Fritz to the church. Fearful row in the carriage; aunt Lulu and uncle Fritz fighting like cat and dog. At last uncle Fritz’s top hat fell into a puddle as he got out of the carriage. Then drove to Hotel to fetch Papa and from there back to church. Papa went into the Church, I into the so called Sacristei, where we all were assembled. Then Spörri came in and led the way into Church, we following in single file. Papa and aunt Lulu sat in the first row; We sat down around the altar. after Spörri had said a prayer. Then after a hymn we all had to get up and answer some formal questions in a kind of litany, after which we had to go forward two and two and Spörri said a few words to each of us and then gave us both together a sentence out of the Bibel. Me „Kämpfet den guten Kampf des Glaubens und ergreifet das ewige Leben“. We had to stand the whole time about an hour and a half. I was quite dead at the end. Then he blessed us and after some music we went back into the vestry where our friends came and congratulated us. I then drove to the Hotel with Papa and from there to Meyers Auguste und Friedrich where we breakfasted and I saw my presents. Papa and Mamma gave me a magnificent gold watch and chain and a large atlas, Gee a pair of studs, Meyers a locket which is at the same time a seal with Mamma and Papas portrait in it and the Frithjofssage, Kempffs Auguste und Georg golden cuffstuds and Willy Kempffa golden pencil, Hasperg Amanda und Heinrich
Niebelungen, Busses Auguste und Friedrich a leather pocket book, Nita a serviette ring and the children three golden studs. After breakfast all came to congratulate first Busses, Alice Busse who was confirmed on the 27 too. There was chocolate for the ladies, sherry for the gentlemen. Julius Gabe came too. Papa went to Wandsbek with Willy during that time. At half past five went to the hotel and from there to Haspergs to dinner. Saw Belles presents. I gave her „Das Buch der Königin Luise.“
Horn
Papa and Mamma flowers. Great many healths at dinner. Old M r Ehnett toasted Belle, Spörri me in a very pretty speech, Papa Haspergs, old M r Ehnett Paul Hasperg etc. etc. After dinner it was rather stupid. Nothing to be done. Walked home with Papa at about 11. Telegram with many happy returns of the day from Mamma and Gee and letters from both too and from Marie also a sweet little card and picture from dear little Gee. At table sat between Belle and Heine
Hasperg, Heinrich , Alice Busse between Heine and Willy K. very bad place.
